overview: The Dagor Dagorath or the Final Battle is the end-times event described in the works of J. R. R. Tolkien, in which the forces of evil will wage a final battle against the forces of good, bringing an end to the world as we know it, so that a new one may be born. This short animated film was based on the prophecy made by the Ainu Mandos, one of the Valar, and imagines how the Dark Lord Melkor will return and how he will bring the ultimate darkness to EÃ¤.
title: Dagor Dagorath
